column1: UNCANNY SPEED. With a blur of movement, the Spitter becomes impossible to target in any way until its next turn.
UNNATURAL REFLEXES. The Spitter increases its Initiative by 1.
CORROSIVE SPIT. The Spitter hurls a ball of acidic phlegm that deals 5D6 damage and has a 1 in 6 chance of destroying the piece of protective gear it strikes.
